description: Standard medical necessity denial with full clinical context
Prior auth not obtained before outpatient MRI
Member not eligible on date of service - coverage gap
Claim filed past payer timely filing deadline
COB denial - other insurance should be primary
Coding denial - procedure code inconsistent with modifier
Medicare denial - should mention MAC/state variability
Contradictory fields - denial code says paid but context says denied
Tries to make Claude cite specific CMS rules
Fake CARC code that does not exist - should not invent meaning
Minimal input - just the required field with no useful info
